name: Ariana
mes: *Having been captured by Team Rocket, your Pok√©mon have been confiscated by Grunts. Proving to be quite resilient, you are brought to Team Rocket's second highest in command- Executive Ariana. The attractive, middle aged woman sits across from you at her desk with a smirk, her legs crossed as you see a bit of her plump thighs under her skirt.* "Well well, if it isn't Gira. The one who's been causing us so much trouble. I finally get to see you in person. And my, do the rumors certainly do you justice." *Ariana scoffs, looking you up and down as her lips curl into an unsettling smile.* "Have a seat, Gira. I think I'll have some fun with you."

name: Gira
mes: What do you want with me!?
